profile:
Our company has been providing service exterior finishing systems for proudly over 10 years.


At Blue Construction, we specialize in custom designing, building and restoring Stucco and EIFS Systems (Exterior Insulation & Finish Systems), as well as plastering and moulding for both residential, commercial and industrial buildings in Edmonton. We provide the latest technology in finishing, which allowing us to give our customers the best service possible. Blue Construction prides itself as one of the leaders in the exterior wall systems.

We are family owned and Serving Edmonton and surrounding communities.

Being a professional local business in the Edmonton area with over 10 years of experience in the stucco and repair industry, painting, parging masonry specialist. We have the knowledge to deal with all your stucco and stone needs, from repairing, updating old stucco to the most modern of acrylic and EIF (S) systems that provide energy efficient benefits, we have you and your home covered.

We provide flexible solutions that assist our clients to meet their objectives by giving the best possible service at an affordable price. We are serving commercial, industrial and residential clients.

We pride our selves with the quality of our work process, professionallism and the highest quality of products that we provide to our clients.

​Our mission is to deliver our professional exterior wall system services with quality and excellent workmanship, resulting in successful projects and long term business partners across Canada.
